nodes.text: The Tumani system was located in the Interior Region, an area of the Hapes Cluster in the Slice portion of the Inner Rim. It was connected via hyperlanes to the Ediorung and Tinta systems. The Tumani system was the origin point of the gemstones known as Tumanian pressure-rubies.
The Tumani system was introduced in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square O-9.
